attributes.action: Stop flights into the uk during coronavirus outbreak like other countries are.
attributes.additional_details: During the uk outbreak of covid-19, we need to follow the example of other countries by stopping flights to and from the uk to help curb new cases of the coronavirus or at least to try and minimise the spread.  I feel our government are leaving us vunerable with their slow responses to this new deadly virus. Please help try to protect uk citizens and stop travel so we can try and contain cases we already have.
attributes.background: Stop flights to and from the uk during coronavirus outbreak to help minimise new cases and the spread of the virus.
